title: HW_DECODED_VIDEO_ZERO_COPY/VIDEO_HARDWARE_OVERLAY block by gfxInfo
content: I'm running on Windows 11 with NVIDIA 30 series card. Firefox is on 118.0.1, driver on 537.42(latest at this time) I think it is weird that HW_DECODED_VIDEO_ZERO_COPY/VIDEO_HARDWARE_OVERLAY is blocked by gfxInfo in about:support. I have check Blocklisting. I can't found something relate to NVIDIA recent cards or driver. And I would like to ask if firefox at this time support hevc hardware decoding?
creator: hikari_dayo

title: Locked out! - Can't find the Authentication FIrefox breowser asks me for after entering my password
content: I recently logged out of Firefox and cannot log back in because the process requires an authenticator app, which I have no clue which would work. I have MS Authenticator and Google Authenticator but neither of them bring up any codes sent from Firefox. What on earth can I do? Delete my account and then create a new account with that same email again? However, I can't do that, because I can't login! I'm presently login with another email address, which is how I am posting on this forum. Thanks for your help.
creator: onlinepoised

title: several times
content:
Ligação não estabelecida

Ocorreu um erro durante a ligação a pt.itopvpn.com. 

   O site pode estar temporariamente indisponível ou demasiado ocupado. Tente novamente dentro de alguns momentos.    Se não conseguir carregar quaisquer páginas, verifique a ligação do seu computador à rede.    Se o seu computador ou rede estiverem protegidos por uma firewall ou proxy, certifique-se de que o Firefox tem permissão para aceder à Web.
creator: dionisiomendes

title: OTP havi kivonat nem irható ki, az egyik bankszámlámról. Mit tegyek, hogy vissza tudjak térni az OTP direktre,mert ott ki tudnám iratni.
content: vissza kellene térnem ahhoz az állapothoz, mielőtt áttértem a digitális bankra.
creator: busai.katalin

title: firefox 118.0.1 : instabilità e corruzione profilo e continuo downgrade alla  v 117
content:
buongiorno

dal 29 settembre , con l'upgrade alla versione 118.0.1 su OS win11 x64 , sto riscontrando corruzioni frequenti del profilo durante le sessioni di lavoro ( all'apertura di nuove schede o ricerche ) che mi costringe a creare un nuovo profilo ( lo indica FF ) con downgrade alla versione 117 ( che non capisco ) Non sono presenti "crash report". Succede anche senza "sync" dei dati dal mio profilo in cloud e/o import e con impostazioni di default del browser e con e senza estensioni (cookie manager e lasspass ) . Scansione AV non ha dato esiti. Sono passato al "beta" per vedere se con la versione 119 si presenta il problema ; poi proverò in "Troubleshoot Mode"

suggerimenti / indicazioni sono graditi grazie saluti MM
creator: massimo.maringoni

title: Open address bar url /  searches in background
content:
Hello, I've set FF to open addresses and search from the url bar in a new tab. I want to set that tab to open in the background, which is something I've managed to do in the past, but I can't find this option now.

What's the about:config parameter for this? Thanks
creator: tanin

title: Firefox browser
content: Tune in will not play since my latest update , just get circling arrow in the play/pause area . I tried the site on chrome and music plays just fine .
creator: kobark

title: En la versión 118 ha dejado de mostrar tipografía seleccionada en configuración
content: Buenas: Llevo años con la configuración de una fuente forzosa para todas las páginas, todas las páginas se mostraban con la tipografía que había elegido. Al actualizar a la versión 118, en los dos ordenadores que tengo, ha dejado de funcionar y todo se muestra en arial. He revisado la configuración y sigue como estaba antes (de hecho cuando me pasó en el primero comparé con el segundo, que no estaba actualizado y la configuración era la misma). ¿Alguna pista? Sistema operativo Ubuntu 20.04 LTS.
creator: lamoradadehades

title: Editing the hyperlink context menu
content:
Hello,

Wondering whether there's a straightforward way to edit the hyperlink context menu to; 

i) add a command for opening the selected hyperlinks with a specific program

ii) change the order of the commands

Thanks,
creator: flaganan

title: Gamepad api doesn't work in firefox but it does in chrome
content: I am using the web api for videogame controllers to make a web remote controller for a robot, i use django to host the server. When i access the ip of the Django server in firefox i get errors like: getGamepads is not a function or errors while trying to get gamepads from the navigator, but when i access through chrome this does not happen. These errors only happen while accessing through the django server, when i access through the local file or other pages in the web that use gamepad api there is no issue. Because of that i think that it has something to do with firefox tight security restrictions on http sites, but i can't find a way to grant permission to my page to work properly, i am willing to compromise in security since it's just going to be used locally
creator: bendca61

title: I need "Never Ask Agian" to update password when i login in website by "Saved user-name and password"
content: Every time i login in website by "Saved user-name and password"，the Explorer will advise me to update saved password.Once i click "UPDATE",my saved password will be override by Random Strong Password and makes me can not login in next time. no matter how i click"update"or"not",the advise will show every time when i login in websites. ps: "Suggest and generate strong passwords" in setting is not chioced.
creator: yucong1989

title: I'm going to lose it, Error code: SEC_ERROR_UNKNOWN_ISSUER, turns into opendns content filtering

title: Shortcut on mac not working
content: On MacOS Sonoma, ctrl+cmd+space opens a pop up for special characters. It was working fine until last week. Now it works everywhere on my computer, except for Firefox. What gives? Can you guys fix that, please?
creator: cadir66737
